scope: Documentation quality audit remediation tracking and closure

severity_classes.name: critical
severity_classes.definition: Incorrect or missing guidance that can cause operator misuse, unsafe behavior, or gate blockage.

severity_classes.name: high
severity_classes.definition: Materially incomplete or misleading documentation that degrades onboarding, runtime operations, or compliance evidence.

severity_classes.name: medium
severity_classes.definition: Quality debt that reduces clarity or consistency but does not block critical operations.

severity_classes.name: low
severity_classes.definition: Minor wording, formatting, or discoverability issues with low operational risk.

checklist_items: Confirm finding scope and impacted docs/commands.
Assign owner and due date based on severity SLA.
Document remediation steps and linked PR/issues.
